name: Al'drich von Grossynkiir
effect:
Mercenary Dragon Lord Overlord • Unique
Your Dragons are not unique. In addition to his normal starting characters Al'drich begins the game with one Dragon in rank 3 and one in rank 4.
May bring dragons into play 3 ranks below their printed level.

name: Canis
effect:
If Canis is in play at the start of the game, your deck may consist of more than 50% of one card type.
If Canis is in play at the start of the game, you begin with 3rd level characters in place of starting 1st level characters and 5th level characters in place of the 2nd level characters.

name: Cear Adinerach
effect:
Elf Medusan Lord • Assassin • Unique
If Cear is wounded by a melee strike from Logan Ebonwoulfe with the Knives fo Betrayal attached, Cear is killed. Begins the game with The Black Knives attached and Black Tom in the third rank.
React: Before you perform an action, discard a card from the top of your deck to move one of your Rogues forward or backward one rank.

name: Deathflail
effect:
Weapon • May not be discarded while Lady Bhaine is in play.
React: Once per turn after a melee strike roll targeting this character, change the result to a 1 or a 20, even if the result may not be changed.

name: Demonslayer
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Good characters only.
Melee strikes by this character ignore the effects of the Astral trait. Whenever this character targets a Monster with a melee strike, he or she gains +5 ATK (+9 total) and the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

name: Lady Bhaine
effect:
Mercenary • Medusan Lord • Paladin • Unique • May equip two Weapons.
Begins the game with Deathflail equipped.
Card effects cannot kill Lady Bhaine.
May cast 1st through 3rd level cleric spells.
Strikes from the Soul Stealer which hit Lady Bhaine inflict two additional wounds.

name: Nassiral Hate
effect:
Nothrog Medusan Lord • Seer • Unique • Scribe
Begins the game with Canis equipped.
Any player may spend the Eye of Morghen as a React when Hate casts a spell to cancel it.
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on or remove a wound from a Nothrog character.
Spend Order: Get a Nothrog character from your deck and put it in your hand.

name: Nightclaw
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Abyssal Astral (even strikes miss) Nightclaw gains +1 ATK for each other Abyssal in this rank.

name: Qor-Teth
effect:
Abyssal Overlord • Mercenary • Monster
Astral Abyssals in this army all gain Magic Resistant. If Qor-Teth is your warlord, there is no limit to the number of each Abyssal in your deck and you start with an additional 1st and 2nd level character in play. Order: Once per turn, get an Abyssal from your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck. Order: Once per game, attach a 1st through 5th level wizard spell to Qor-Teth. While attached, he can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand and he were a wizard.

name: Shadowreaver
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Abyssal Astral (even strikes miss)
Shadowreaver may not be targeted by melee strikes with an ATK less than five. Order: Once per game, attach a 1st or 2nd level wizard spell to Shadowreaver. While attached, he can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand and he were a wizard.

name: Skincrawler
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Abyssal Astral (even strikes miss) Order: Spend an Abyssal in the rank in front of this one to move Skincrawler forward one rank. If Skincrawler is in the 1st rank, he may spend to attack.

name: The Black Knives
effect:
Unique • May not be discarded while Cear Adinerach is in play.
Characters wounded by an action or Melee strike from this character are killed. During the Draw phase, draw 5 cards instead of drawing until you have 5 cards.
Order: Once per game you may declare an "Assassin's Strike." During this turn, all of your Rogues' melee strikes inflict an additional wound.
